nodes.text: A species was native to the planet Dersonn III, in the Dersonn system. Around the year 3951 BBY, they were nearly rendered extinct and the remainder of their population was enslaved by the notorious Wookiee bounty hunter Hanharr.
The species first mention was in the LucasArts video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords. It also received an entry in Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion.
